The seiza thing sounds like how Takuan Soho, the Zen Master and friend
of Yagyu Munenori (of Yagyu Shinkage Ryuu), died. Just before he
passed on, he took his calligraphy brush, assumed a seiza position,
wrote "Yume" (dream), put down the brush, and died.

Sounds similar.

--M.
